title: Boyfriend Kourin!
overview: 23-year-old Asahi attracts everyone around with his innocent smile, politeness and talent.Â 35-year-old Tyatani Kasiko works in a small advertising agency, she has low self-esteem.Sato Wataru is a supporting actress in a small theater company run by her boyfriend, and sometimes works for him as a literary Negro.Kashiko and Wataru were best friends in high school, and now they're dating again, thanks to Asahi.
